data.Name: Beth Hart and the Ocean of Souls
data.Bio: Beth Hart & the Ocean of Souls is an early project of Beth Hart. The album was recorded 1993 at Chick Corea's Mad Hatter Studios in Los Angeles with producer Geoffrey Leigh Tozer. The album was unavailable for a long time and re-released in 2009. Tracks: 1 Halfway to Heaven 2 Just Call Me Up 3 Can't Hear the Word 4 Get Over It 5 Love Suffers All 6 I Felt Him Cry 7 Lucy in the Sky With Diamonds 8 Am I the One 9 It's Too Late 10 Show Me the Way 11 Love Thing 12 On With the Show 13 Keep On Goin' Read more on Last.fm
